===Etymology===
From {{zh-l|屎|faeces}}; the latter two syllables are likely from a dialectal unstressed name for the insect, eventually cognate with {{m|zh|蜣螂}} ({{IPAchar|*/k.laŋ/}}, "dung beetle").
